title: Essential SFX
description: Looking for the ultimate sound effects package to take your game to the next level? Look no further than the Essential SFX pack!
longDescription:
Preview || Support Discord



Looking for the ultimate sound effects package to take your game to the next level?


Look no further than Essential SFX pack!

With over 350 high-quality sound effects to choose from, this pack has everything you need to bring your game to life. From explosions and gunshots to footsteps and wooshes, this pack has got you covered. Each sound effect has been meticulously crafted and edited to ensure maximum impact and authenticity, and this library covers all the bases so you can create any kind of game you want.


Leave a review to gain access to the giveaway channel in the Support Discord!







What is this pack?💻

This pack features 364 high quality sound effects!

  • 364 High quality sound effects
  • Background sounds
  • Explosions
  • Footsteps
  • Weapons
  • Impacts
  • Wind
  • Sports
  • UI
  • Wooshes








Where can I find more?📣


  • -My YouTube-
  • -My Product Page-
  • -My Website-







Got any questions?💭

Feel free to send me an email, or just ask your question in the question section of this page!

Or join the Support Discord!


Thank you for considering my pack!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 364 High quality sound effects
  • Background sounds
  • Explosions
  • Footsteps
  • Weapons
  • Impacts
  • Wind
  • Sports
  • UI
  • Wooshes

Number of Audio Waves: 364

Number of Audio Cues: 364

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
